about_the_game:
Ninja Wars: Battle Simulator is a stylized war simulator designed with 3D graphics. This exciting game invites you to fifteen challenging levels. Although the first levels are easy, the difficulty increases as the levels progress. You will encounter enemies in the valley where the battle is held among the old Chinese houses and you will apply your strategy in the best way.

Challenging Levels and Strategy Development
In each level, you must create the strongest army using the gold provided to you. There are three main characters in the game: Swordsman, Spearman and Archer. Each character has their own unique abilities and characteristics. The key to victory is to carefully analyze the formation of the opposing team and the characters they use before the battle and create your army.

Since the Swordsman fights in close combat, his health is quite high. However, since the archer character shoots from a distance, his health is low. You can also achieve easy victories by creating your army according to the formation of the opposing team.

This game, especially themed around ninja wars, offers players a rich strategy experience. Examining the enemy formation and arranging your own army accordingly is not only a war tactic, but also a sign of being a successful leader. Therefore, improve your skills by trying different formations every time and defeat your opponents!

Automatic Battle and Instant Monitoring
Battles take place automatically, which gives you the opportunity to prepare your strategies in advance and watch the battle. You can instantly follow the status of your army and evaluate the course of the battle by zooming in on the battlefield with the mouse. While the battle of both teams continues automatically, you can think of the best strategies for the next levels.

If you lose in a level, this gives you the opportunity to try new tactics. You can regain your strength on the battlefield and fight for victory again by making better formations and character choices. As you develop your strategy, you will be better able to cope with the difficulties of the battles.

Step into a World Full of Ninja Characters
Ninja Wars: Battle Simulator is not only a battle simulator, but also a platform where you can improve yourself in the world of strategy games. Create the most effective armies by thinking about which features of which character you will use in this battlefield full of archers, swordsmen and spearmen. Each character has their own unique abilities and advantages, so you will need to think strategically to achieve victory on the battlefield.

You can neutralize your enemies from afar using your archers, achieve victory in close combat with your swordsmen, and break through enemy lines with your spearmen. Develop all the skills needed to achieve victory by making strategic moves.

Highlights of the Battle Simulator Game
Impressive 3D Graphics: A combat experience filled with stylized and impressive 3D graphics.
15 Challenging Levels: 15 different levels of difficulty and 15 different sections requiring different levels of strategy.
Three Main Characters: Develop various strategies with Swordsman, Spearman and Archer characters.
Automatic Battle: Apply your tactics with the opportunity to watch battles and create strategies.

Ninja Wars: Battle Simulator will take you on an exciting journey while also improving your strategic thinking and decision-making skills. It offers an unmissable experience for fans of ninja games, battle simulators and strategy games. Step into the battlefield immediately and win victories.
